nodes.text: Dekk'lar was a male Twi'lek information broker living during the Cold War and Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Dekk'lar appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the recurring Bounty Contract Week event introduced in Game Update 2.3: Titans of Industry on August 6, 2013. He can appear on a variety of planets randomly selected during the event including Ord Mantell, Coruscant, Nal Hutta, Dromund Kaas, Nar Shaddaa, Tatooine, Alderaan, and Voss. The player has the option to ask him for information nicely, rudely or neutrally. In any case, he provides the location of a local crime lord's henchman. As such, his role in the game is almost entirely random or player-driven and a canonical path currently cannot be determined.

When initiating conversation with Dekk'lar, players of any gender and faction alignment are propositioned with a "wild night out" by the Twi'lek. When asking Dekk'lar for information, the neutral option allows the player character to flirt back with Dekk'lar. If this option is selected, Dekk'lar tells the player they are of "sound mind, body, and taste" and "gives them what they're after."
